title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard to create nested classes, the context is not being set correctly.
OB: When creating a new class using the wizard, the context for nested classes is not set correctly.
EB: When creating a new class using the wizard, the context for nested classes should be set correctly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Select the option to create a nested class.
3. Continue through the wizard to create the nested class.
4. Notice that the context for the nested class is not set correctly.
